Title: Dora's Got a Puppy
Plot: Dora just got a new puppy named Perito, after Dora and Boots picked up a present for Perito from Abuela (Dora's Grandma), they have been warned to watch out for Swiper the Fox. Dora and Boots had to hurry home to take the present home to Perito, before Swiper swipes it. Dora and Boots hurries home and avoids Swiper by going through the Butterfly Garden, through the 10 Dancing Trees, and to Dora's House.
